title: How does those dimestore trash novels survive?
body:
https://discourse-cloud-file-uploads.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/boingboing/original/3X/9/8/9889958ce60401940ae3739f07282afddac7125f.png

https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/51BkvyXRbmL._SX351_BO1,204,203,200_.jpg

https://www.barnesandnoble.com/blog/barnesy/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/CallieHuttonsTheElusiveWife.jpg

Its like they have a dart board that they use to decide the titles. I know old ladies buy a ton of them at a time, but there can't be enough old women to keep these books alive.
